chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
Display-touch doesn't work with letters i, k. Sometimes I can't write. I request an exchange. Thank you
Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist über iCloud\Google gesperrt.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device is currently locked by the customer's iCloud. Inform the customer to unlink their account or we will not be able to proceed with the repair. The customer can follow the instructions from the link below to unlink their iCloud account from the phone.

https://support.apple.com/de-de/guide/icloud/mmfc0eeddd/icloud

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

Any updates on unlinking the iCloud account?

Thank you.

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

Please forward the message to the customer.
Kindly remove the iCloud from the device for the sake of privacy. This is to prevent the leakage of sensitive data. Please unlink your iCloud by following the link provided. Thank you.
https://discussions.apple.com/thread/254177735?sortBy=best

Regards,
KW

Hello ecomobile,

The customer has already disconnected their iCloud account.

Please send the customer a new device

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
